description: This file defines utility functions for anti-cheat measures on the frontend, such as preventing copy-paste actions and tracking tab switches to detect potential cheating behaviors.

methods.name: export function preventCopyPaste() { preventCopyPaste
methods.description: Disables the copy, cut, and paste events to reduce cheating.

methods.name: export function trackTabSwitches(onWarn: () => void) { trackTabSwitches
methods.description: Sets up a listener to warn when the user switches away from the tab.

methods.name: export function cleanupAntiCheat() { cleanupAntiCheat
methods.description: Removes event handlers set by the anti-cheat functions to clean up the environment.

ctags.name: tabSwitchHandler
ctags.pattern: /^let tabSwitchHandler: ((this: Document, ev: Event) => void) | null = null$/

fields.name: let tabSwitchHandler: ((this: Document, ev: Event) => void) | null = null
